title: Hashed Brown Potato Casserole
directions: put potatoes - partailly thawed in large casserole dish
mix soup, sour cream and cheese in seperate bowl, put on top of potatoes
pour crushed corn flakes over cheese mixture
drizzle one stick of melted margerine over corn flakes
bake at 350 for 45-60minutes, takes a little longer if potatoes are not thawed
ingredients: 32 oz bag of frozen hash brown potatoes
1 can cream of chicken soup - fat free
8 oz low fat or fat free sour cream
